title: Requirements
text:
Cloud development
Instead of local development, you may also work in a fully configured dev environment in the cloud with GitHub Codespaces. Take a look at this site to learn more about the different options.

title: Welcome üëã
text:
Welcome to the lab ‚Äú‚Äú

In this lab you will ‚Ä¶






Important



Make sure you meet all the requirements and have read the lecture slides before you start with the assignments


What you will learn in this lab:

How to set up a MySQL database
Use SQL for data analysis
Make use of Pandas for data analysis in Python
Use Altair for data visualization in Python

title: Slides
text:
The following tutorials are mainly based on ‚Äú‚Äù provided by
You have several options to start code development:
For cost reasons we mainly use OpenAI‚Äôs gpt-3.5-turbo model in our tutorials. However, you can simply replace model="gpt-3.5-turbo" with model="gpt-4" in the helper function. Note the price difference between the two models.

title: Notebook
text:
Load Python libaries and API keys.

import os
import openai
import pandas as pd
import altair as alt
from dotenv import load_dotenv, find_dotenv


_ = load_dotenv(find_dotenv()) # read local .env file
openai.api_key  = os.environ['OPENAI_API_KEY']

title: Notebook
